fullText: It asks us to embody the ambition, mendacity, and ruthlessness we carry with us, even when we think we’ve danced them off, and question our complicity. After the non-stop party, the show’s sobering end reminds us that dancing can be as inattentive as it is cathartic.

keyPhrases.quote: It asks us to embody the ambition, mendacity, and ruthlessness we carry with us
the show's sobering end reminds us that dancing can be as inattentive as it is cathartic
